summary:
Just a Follower that I made whilst futzing around with Race Menu and the Creation kit
She can be found at the Drunken huntsman in white run.
descriptionHtml:
Just a Follower that I made whilst futzing around with Race Menu and the Creation kit
She can be found at the Drunken huntsman in white run.

She's a ranged fighter (ranger class Human Missile Fighting style) equipped with an Orcish bow/arrows and I believe she's level 50

Now then If you want her to look like the screenshots you'll need the following mods

Armors By FastestDog http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37946/? For the armor
More elven Skin Tones http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32232/? (Dark elf)
Alt Navestae UNP Seamless http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30181/? For the skin texture
Sporty Sexy map http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13377/? ( For UNP)
And Ethereal Elven Overhaul (I think) http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39211/?

She's been tested and runs flawlessly with AFT (Amazing Follower Tweaks)

But anyhow Install instructions

Install with Nexus Mod Manager or just drag the files into your main skyrim directory (I've provided Face Gen data just in case she suffers from the black face bug)

uninstall with NMM or delete all pertinent files.

Well enough of my Rambling Enjoy and fell free to tell me what you think and upload screen shots ^_^

By the way, I'd like for her to stay on the Nexus, but feel free to shoot me a message if you're considering uploading her anywhere else
author: jynx474
